title: Rolling Charge
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Allows you to perform a rolling charge attack, moving up to any target within 4 tiles and attacking
Damage increases the farther you roll; more accurate, makes some noise.||You can roll at nearby foes to attack. |- |2||Extends the range of your roll to five tiles.||You can roll at foes to attack. |- |3||Extends the range of your roll to six tiles.||You can roll a great distance at foes to attack. |- | colspan="3" | Damage bonus of 1 + (tiles/3) * damage, maximum of 2x at 3 tiles.
'''Species notes:''' Exclusive to [[palentonga]]s, who start at level 1. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
